A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Clearly they will sell a lot of porg dolls\, but how about selling milk dispensers in the shape of sea cows with 4 teats? Riddled with plot holes\, over reliance on humor\, characters killed off with no backstory. I hated the Phantom Menace as much as anyone but at least that movie had character arcs and a logical plot progression.
